thread.title: BRIEF-Brainstorm Cell Received Good Manufacturing Practice Approval From Israel Ministry Of Health

title: BRIEF-Brainstorm Cell Received Good Manufacturing Practice Approval From Israel Ministry Of Health

organizations.name: brief-brainstorm cell received good manufacturing practice approval from israel ministry of health
practice approval from israel ministry of health reuters staff

text:
January 4, 2018 / 2:46 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Brainstorm Cell Received Good Manufacturing Practice Approval From Israel Ministry Of Health Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Jan 4 (Reuters) - Brainstorm Cell Therapuetics Inc: 
* BRAINSTORM CELL THERAPUETICS - RECEIVED GOOD MANUFACTURING PRACTICE APPROVAL FROM ISRAEL MINISTRY OF HEALTH FOR ISRAELI CONTRACT MANUFACTURING FACILITY 
* BRAINSTORM CELL THERAPUETICS INC - APPROVAL ADVANCES COâ€˜S APPLICATION TO ISRAEL MOH FOR TREATMENT OF ALS PATIENTS IN ISRAEL FOR A FEE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
